美しい: (utsukushii) - beautiful, pretty, lovely, sweet, pure (coração, amizade, etc.)
美しい肌の材: (うつくしいはだのざい) - wood of fine grain
美丈夫: (びじょうふ) - good-looking man; fine figure of a man
美之主貝: (ビノスガイ) - Mercenaria stimpsoni (species of Venus clam)
美事: (みごと) - splendid/magnificent/beautiful/admirable; praiseworthy act/feat/commendable deed; (usu. 見事に) utter (esp. defeat)/total/complete
美人局: (つつもたせ) - scheme in which a man and woman trick another man into a compromising situation for blackmail; badger game
美人画: (びじんが) - Ukiyo-e portraying beautiful women
美人薄命: (びじんはくめい) - (yoji) beauty and fortune seldom go together; the beautiful die young
美化語: (びかご) - more refined language through prefixing of "o-" or "-go" to words, and use of appropriate vocabulary
美化運動: (びかうんどう) - a beautification drive
美味: (びみ) - good flavor; good flavour; delicacy
美味い: (うまい) - (esp. 上手い,巧い) skillful/clever/expert/wise/successful; (esp. 美味い,甘い) delicious/appetizing/appetising; (esp. 旨い) fortunate/splendid/promising
美味しい: (oishii) - delicioso, saboroso, doce; atraente, interessante, conveniente, favorável, desejável, lucrativo
美味しいところを持っていく: (おいしいところをもっていく) - to take a big bite; to take the best part/to steal all the good parts/to steal the show
美味しい所を持っていく: (おいしいところをもっていく) - to take a big bite; to take the best part/to steal all the good parts/to steal the show
美品: (びひん) - like-new item; used item in mint condition
美大: (びだい) - college of the arts; university of the arts; art university
美容外科: (びようげか) - cosmetic surgery; aesthetic surgery
美容整形手術: (びようせいけいしゅじゅつ) - cosmetic surgery
美容柳: (ビョウヤナギ) - Chinese hypericum (Hypericum monogynum)
美容法: (びようほう) - beauty regimen; beauty treatment; cosmetic technique
美容液: (びようえき) - essence; liquid foundation; beauty lotion; serum
美容院: (びよういん) - beauty parlour; beauty parlor; beauty salon; hairdressing salon
美少年: (びしょうねん) - handsome youth; pretty boy
美形: (びぎょう) - beautiful form; beautiful shape; beauty
美意識: (びいしき) - sense of beauty; aesthetic sense
美感: (びかん) - sense of beauty; aesthetic sense
美文調: (びぶんちょう) - an ornate style
美濃紙: (みのがみ) - Mino paper (var. of Japanese paper)
美点: (びてん) - (ant: 欠点・1) virtue; charm; merit; good point
美男葛: (びなんかずら) - scarlet kadsura (Kadsura japonica); white sash tied around the head, with ends hanging down and tucked into belt, worn in kyogen to indicate a female character being played by a man
美白: (びはく) - prevention of sun-related skin damage; skin whitening
美白美人: (びはくびじん) - beautiful white-skinned lady (usu. wrt to freckle removal and skin whitening products)
美的感覚: (びてきかんかく) - aesthetic feeling; aesthetic sense; sense of beauty
美的生活: (びてきせいかつ) - an aesthetic existence
美称: (びしょう) - euphemism; eulogistic name; poetical name; poetic name
美育: (びいく) - training in aesthetics; aesthetic education; cultural study
美脚: (びきゃく) - beautiful legs; great legs
美術品: (びじゅつひん) - work of art
美術商: (びじゅつしょう) - art dealer; fine art(s) shop
美術大学: (びじゅつだいがく) - college of the arts; university of the arts; art university
美術学校: (びじゅつがっこう) - art school
美術工芸: (びじゅつこうげい) - arts and crafts; artistic handicraft; fine and applied art
美術愛好家: (びじゅつあいこうか) - art lover; lover of art
美術界: (びじゅつかい) - the world of the arts
美術監督: (びじゅつかんとく) - art director
